entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -18.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 6:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -18.5°C
Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -20.6°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this evening then to light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
